name: biological-machines-radioactive-tissue
title: Biological Machines: Radioactive Tissue
author: bradythehuman
description: Adds tissue dropped by biter nests which may be cultivated in a biochamber using bioflux and u-235. The tissue may be crafted into a new nuclear military science pack, various machines (including new military assembler with 50% base productivity), poison gas, uranium ore (centrifuge) and clones.
